targets.expr: (sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$server1_cpu_instance",job="$server1_cpu_job", mode!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$server1_cpu_instance",job="$server1_cpu_job"}[$__rate_interval])))) * 100
